House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08424
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8799 (R.A. 8799), OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE SECURITIES REGULATION CODE
ABSTRACT : Intends to address the fact that due to the increasing number of corporations or association that is under the jurisdiction and the power of the SEC, it is inevitable that its legal fiction can be used to defraud the investing public. Includes amendments that will address the growing complexities of securities' transactions that will bolster the power of the SEC to effectively enforce its rules and regulations and render public service efficiently.
